title: Enhancing the stereoselectivity of Me2GaOR(NHC) species in the ring-opening polymerization of rac-lactide, with the help of the chelation effect
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,28638-28647
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05320F, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Paweł Horeglad, Anna Rola-Noworyta, Dawid Tuszyński, Iga Fabianowska, Natalia Agnieszka Marek, Patrycja Gładysz, Ireneusz Wielgus, Anna Maria Dąbrowska
Using Me2GaOR(NHC) complexes for the ROP of rac-LA, we have demonstrated and discussed the effect of the chelate interaction between the growing PLA chain and gallium on the stereoselectivity of propagating species – Me2Ga(OPLA)(NHC).
